sep.gaia.controller.settings

Class SliderListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.controller.settings.SliderListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

    public class SliderListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
    This class is to implement the ActionListener interface to check if the user wants to change the maximal cache size.
    Author:
    Max Witzelsperger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SliderListener(javax.swing.JLabel cacheSize)
      Constructs a new SliderListener, which changes the size of the tile cache dependent on the status of the slider that this is attached to.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • SliderListener

        public SliderListener(javax.swing.JLabel cacheSize)
        Constructs a new SliderListener, which changes the size of the tile cache dependent on the status of the slider that this is attached to. When the cache size is changed, the cached data gets automatically deleted.
        Parameters:
        cacheSize - shows the current cache size to the user, which is set to 0 when stateChanged is invoked
